Title: San Andreas
Writer: Carlton Cuse, Andre Fabrizio, Jeremy Passmore
Actors: Dwayne Johnson, Carla Gugino, Alexandra Daddario
Plot: In the aftermath of a massive earthquake in California, a rescue-chopper pilot makes a dangerous journey with his ex-wife across the state in order to rescue his daughter.
Production: Village Roadshow Pictures, RatPac-Dune Entertainment, New Line Cinema
